field: # QUESTION: Is the same RESPNO mean the same person over time
variable: or are the RESPNOs generated fresh each ROUND?

description: Round of surveys
Respondent number
Country in alphabetical order
Urban or rural sample unit

In general how would you describe – your own living conditions?
In general how would you rate your general living conditions compare to those of other [country]?
Do you have a job that pays a cash income? If yes is it full-time or part-time? If no are you presently looking for a job?
Over the past year how often if ever have you or anyone in your family gone without: Enough food to eat?

Over the past year how often if ever have you or anyone in your family gone without: Medicines or medical treatment?
Over the past year how often if ever have you or anyone in your family gone without: Enough fuel to cook your food?
